name: Clearbridge Mobile
description:
Clearbridge Mobile is an award-winning full stack mobile app development company that provides user-centric product design and engineering services. Leveraging a custom squad-based agile process that reduces risk and gives you predictable project velocity, we work with you to create compelling mobile experiences that your users love. 
 
Founded in 2011, Clearbridge Mobile has developed more than 200 apps for Fortune 1000 clients and rapid-growth start ups that have accrued over 100 million downloads. It has emerged as one of the fastest growing mobile app companies in North America by working with clients like The New York Times, PayPal, Dow Jones, Free The Children, Gannett/USA Today, Tim Hortons, Wall Street Journal, and many more.
Clearbridge expertise also extends behind the firewall. Infrastructure capabilities range from SharePoint, .Net, Ruby on Rails, Node.JS, SQL and others.
